components.description:
A yellow face with open eyes, raised or furrowed eyebrows, and a broad frown. May convey a variety of moderately sad or tense emotions, including concern, anxiety, alarm, disappointment, and unhappiness. 

Apple’s design features the same eye expression as on its ðŸ˜¯ Hushed Face. Not to be confused with ðŸ˜²  Astonished Face or ðŸ˜µ Dizzy Face. 

Samsung’s design previously included sweat droplets coming from its cheeks, a shorthand for anxiety in manga and anime.
components.title: Worried Face

title: Worried Face

version.description: A small update to the much larger Unicode 6.0. Unicode 6.1 included 13 new emoji characters.

emoji_net_data.definition: Face with a sad mouth, and worried-looking eyebrows. Worried Face was approved as part of Unicode 6.1 in 2012 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015 http://emojipedia.org/worried-face/
emoji_net_data.name: worried face

bn:00101571a: Afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief.
Afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief

bn:00110036a: Feeling mentally uncomfortable because something is missing or wrong.
Experiencing or showing sorrow or unhappiness- Christina Rossetti

bn:00107231a: Easily agitated or alarmed; on edge or edgy.

bn:00082447v: To disturb with fear; to throw into a state of alarm or fright; to affright; to terrify.

bn:00095829v: Be worried, concerned, anxious, troubled, or uneasy

bn:00036672n: Wrinkling of the brows or face.
A frown is a facial expression in which the eyebrows are brought together, and the forehead is wrinkled, usually indicating displeasure, sadness or worry, or less often confusion or concentration.
A facial expression of dislike or displeasure
The wrinkling of the brows or face in frowning; the expression of displeasure, sullenness, or discontent in the countenance; an angry frown.
A facial expression in which the eyebrows are brought together, and the forehead is wrinkled, usually indicating displeasure, sadness or worry, or less often confusion or concentration.

bn:00021558n: Worry refers to the thoughts, images and emotions of a negative nature in which mental attempts are made to avoid anticipated potential threats.
Thoughts and images of a negative nature related to anticipated potential threats
Something or someone that causes anxiety; a source of unhappiness
Worry is one of two components of anxiety.
The expression of solicitude, anxiety, or compassion toward a thing or person.

bn:00078425n: Worry refers to the thoughts, images and emotions of a negative nature in which mental attempts are made to avoid anticipated potential threats.
Thoughts and images of a negative nature related to anticipated potential threats
Worry is one of two components of anxiety.

apple_vendor_description: The worried face emoji on Apple devices features a classic yellow face with wide, downturned eyes and a furrowed brow, conveying a palpable sense of anxiety or concern. Appleâ€™s design employs soft, rounded edges and realistic lighting that subtly highlight the stress lines on its forehead, making the emotion instantly recognizable. This emoji is a direct and effective way to express unease, apprehension, or mild distress in a digital message.
